channel.title: Humans of Nosara

item.title: Gustavo Miranda Cambronero
item.description: My name is Gustavo Miranda Cambronero but you can call me Tao. I first arrived in SÃ¡mara looking for a new way of life because I found the city too complicated and monotonous, it is always the same scene with different characters, I wanted something more than that. I started studying arts and it was in this moment that I realised that cooking was my thing. I noticed when I put my food on the table the entire energy of the room changed.
